titleSecondLine: I design and develop fullstack applications.
description: I'm a software engineer focused on fullstack development.
thingsIDoDescription: Coding, strategy and development are my specialties, I have been working on this for almost 8 years improving my skills. In all my projects, I find that efficient workflows, good communication and a dose of self-discipline are key.
aboutDescription: My name is Cleiton Souza, I'm a software engineer focused on fullstack development who is looking forward to working remotely around the world or in person in Minas Gerais. I am deeply passionate about developing fullstack applications that bring value and greater accessibility and fluidity to people's lives.
